purpose: To present a customer acquisition strategy for converting VISA cards to Mastercard through customer segmentation.
title: Customer Acquisition: Driving VISA to MC Conversion Support in North America for a Large US Issuer through customer segmentation

bullets.text: Ingestion of historical VISA data for cards subject to conversion
Customer segmentation driven by customer value, revolve behavior and consistency & breadth of spend on a card
Detailed post-conversion marketing calendar with offer recommendations
Profitability model estimating impact of marketing treatments on retained and incremental spend

supporting_facts: A large US issuer reached a global agreement with MC to convert all consumer credit cards to Mastercard.

content_zones.right: Detailed Customer Segmentation, Post-Conversion Marketing Calendar, Incremental Spend Forecast Model
